title: Person Of Interest - Freezer Truck Scene
author: Karen Gonzales
comment: Caviezel really knocked it out of the park with this scene, I hope he's nominated for an emmy for this performance

i wish there could be a crossover episode between NCIS and Person of Interest... now that would be something worth watching. Gibbs and Reese... just picture it.. i can and its amazing. And its not IMPOSSIBLE.

I just love how paternal John is with Leila and I love how her hands are so small compared to John's huge hands, well after all she is a baby but still its so cute. And I loved it when Leila's hand was on his shoulder, barely gripping it because her hand was so small. I also loved it when John kept on saying "Cry'' because he's like so soft spoken and that little kiss he gave her.... so adorable. And I love Jim's hands.
Elias being a SOB and Reese being adorably protective.
This episode was top notch. Perfect double cross. This was a quality show that got me hooked.
description: Person Of Interest every Thursday on CBS
